caption.p: Transcriptome analysis of cellular responses to MN maturation. a Principal component analysis of all samples, n = 3; (b) Histogram of differentially expressed genes (DEGs) (adjusted p < 0.0002, fold change > 3) among D7 - D28 samples in the pairwise comparison with D0; ( c) Histogram of DEGs in pairwise comparisons between adjacent timepoints (D0-D7, D7-D13, D13–18, D18–28)
